name: Scorched Canyon (Level Design Jam)
description:
Steal TOP SECRET enemy documents. Kill or sneak your way your way through the puzzle riddled mountain pass. Hunt down the vile Sleeveless Jack.

This is a level design project it is a submission to Steve Lee's Level Design Jam 02.

Guide/Controls: Info Sheet.docx

[Important] I have a level design creation kit which allows me to use some basic AI, weapons, and a climbing system etc. To clarify I did not create this tool kit. I designed the level but did not create the player controller and other mechanics.
